unittitle_ssm: Panorama of New York, Brooklyn, and Vicinity viewbook
abstract_ssm: The viewbook contains two black-and-white panoramic foldouts of views from the top of the Brooklyn Bridge towers--from the Brooklyn-side tower looking towards Manhattan and from the Manhattan-side tower looking towards Brooklyn.
